thread.title: Eron Harris gets subbed in for final seconds of Senior Day game
thread.title_full: Eron Harris gets subbed in for final seconds of Senior Day game

title: Eron Harris gets subbed in for final seconds of Senior Day game
text:
Eron Harris gets subbed in for final seconds of Senior Day game Really cool of Tom Izzo to give this young man a Senior Day moment he'll never forget. â€” CBS Sports (@CBSSports) February 26, 2017 
Eron Harris' Michigan State career came to a disappointing end last week when the senior blew out his knee. Or so we thought at the time. With the Spartans comfortably ahead against Wisconsin in the final moments of their Senior Day game, Tom Izzo subbed Harris into the game and gave him a chance to fulfill the MSU tradition of kissing the Spartans logo at midcourt. 
Harris would still have preferred to finish his college career healthy, but it's really cool that he was able to get one last pop from the home crowd at the Breslin Center. Author
